name: Kitten Roundup
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam Online 2021.

You play as a mother cat who must find her kittens after being separated from them. The most purrfect 3D Catformer game on the market. It is impawsible not to love this game.

~~~~~~~Credits!~~~~~~

Programmers- Ethan Bowen and Parimal Raghaven

Level Designers- Penny Lewis, Marc-Julian Galicha, and Alex Egan

3D Artists- Noah Siddoway, Owen Bunzel, Breann Evans, Tanner "The Dip" Brown

Sound Engineers- Marc-Julian Galicha and Penny Lewis

Producer- Ezra Botansky

Rigging- Noah Siddoway

Concept Art- Ivan Lee

Texturing- Owen Bunzel, Ivan Lee, Noah Siddoway

Animations- Breann Evans, Penny Lewis, Noah Siddoway

Shader created by Owen Bunzel
